WMI

Moment Timezone Playground

Parse and display dates in any timezone.
Result:
LondonSydneyBeijingTokyoSan Francisco





#Formatting

Examples

Date

ExampleOutput
YYYY-MM-DD2014-01-01
dddd, MMMM Do YYYYFriday, May 16th 2014
dddd [the] Do [of] MMMMFriday the 16th of May

Time

ExampleOutput
hh:mm a12:30 pm

Used by Moment.js and date-fns/format. Similar to Java SimpleDateFormat.

Date

SymbolExampleArea
d0..6Weekday
ddSu
dddSun
ddddSunday
YY13Year
YYYY2013
M1..12 (Jan is 1)Month
Mo1st..12th
MM01..12 (Jan is 1)
MMMJan
MMMMJanuary
Q1..4Quarter
Qo1st..4th
D1..31Day
Do1st..31st
DD01..31
DDD1..365Day of year
DDDo1st..365th
DDDD001..365
w1..53Week of year
wo1st..53rd
ww01..53

Time

SymbolExampleArea
H0..2324h hour
HH00..23
h1..1212h hour
hh01..12
m0..59Minutes
mm00..59
s0..59Seconds
ss00..59
aamAM/PM
AAM
Z+07:00Timezone offset
ZZ+0730
S0..9Deciseconds
SS00..99Centiseconds
SSS000..999Milliseconds
XUnix timestamp
xMillisecond Unix timestamp

Presets

ExampleOutput
LT8:30 PM
LTS8:30:25 PM
LLAugust 2 1985
llAug 2 1985
LLLAugust 2 1985 08:30 PM
lllAug 2 1985 08:30 PM
LLLLThursday, August 2 1985 08:30 PM
llllThu, Aug 2 1985 08:30 PM
